about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a living, breathing island where every character has a purpose, a past, and a destiny. In Castaway Coalition, you're not just a player; you're a part of a community of survivors, each with their unique DNA, traits, and needs. Draw inspiration from legendary titles like Dwarf Fortress, RimWorld, and Crusader Kings 3, and step into a world that continues to thrive, evolve, and surprise, even when you're not actively shaping its course.

Features:

🌍 LIVE Amongst Immersive NPCs: Every character isn't just a model; they have their own personality, desires, and life goals. Understand them, work with them, or simply observe as their stories unfold.

🛠 BUILD and Thrive Together: Harness the resources of the island and the talents of your community to construct shelters, tools, and a sustainable life.

🦀 SURVIVE the Island’s Mysteries: From unpredictable weather patterns to the lurking dangers in the dense forests, survival is a group effort.

🚶 FPS Immersion: Step into the shoes of a survivor. Every decision, action, or inaction you take resonates in the community's rhythm.

🌳 DYNAMIC World That Breathes: The island doesn't wait. Whether you're actively participating or taking a backseat, the world around you grows, changes, and reacts.

🎭 DNA Driven Stories: Characters inherit traits, forge relationships, and evolve based on their DNA. Witness generational tales of love, conflict, and survival.

Inspired by LEGENDS: Draw wisdom from monumental games like Dwarf Fortress, RimWorld, and Crusader Kings 3.

content_descriptors.notes: Castaway Coalition contains Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol, and Language.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960/AMD Radeon R9 290 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700/AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480 or equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
